explanation: Uses the low-latency Wi‑Fi interface (llw0) to transmit to the all-nodes IPv6 multicast group on a high, uncommon UDP port, exploiting a secondary wireless medium per T1011.
rationale_steps: Query ipconfig for the IPv6 address on llw0 to ensure traffic egresses over the low-latency Wi‑Fi medium.
Bind the sender to that address and target a link-local multicast scope.
Transmit data over an uncommon UDP port to minimize signature-based detection.
